channel.title: Audio Backend on EasyRPG Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in Audio Backend on EasyRPG Wiki

item.title: No Audio
item.description: No Audio The no audio plugin is a stub implementation of the Audio API. It can be used for plattforms that have no support for the other Backends or if you don’t like sounds and want to save processing time. To use the plugin undefine macro SUPPORT_AUDIO. Files audio.cpp (Stub Implementation)
